Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Exceptions
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.mongodb.MongoOptions
    Please use MongoClientOptions instead.
    com.mongodb.MongoURI
    Replaced by MongoClientURI
  • Deprecated Exceptions 
    Exceptions and Description
    com.mongodb.MongoException.DuplicateKey
    This class will be dropped in 3.x versions. Please catch MongoDuplicateKeyException instead.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.mongodb.gridfs.GridFS.MAX_CHUNKSIZE
    You can calculate max chunkSize with a similar formula Mongo.getMaxBsonObjectSize() - 500*1000. Please ensure that you left enough space for metadata (500kb is enough).
    com.mongodb.ReadPreference.PRIMARY
    As of release 2.9.0, replaced by ReadPreference.primary()
    com.mongodb.ReadPreference.SECONDARY
    As of release 2.9.0, replaced by ReadPreference.secondaryPreferred()
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.mongodb.Mongo.Holder.connect(MongoURI)
    Please use Mongo.Holder.connect(MongoClientURI) instead.
    com.mongodb.ReflectionDBObject.containsKey(String) 
    com.mongodb.ReflectionDBObject.JavaWrapper.containsKey(String) 
    com.mongodb.gridfs.GridFSFile.containsKey(String)
    Please use GridFSFile.containsField(String) instead.
    org.bson.BSONObject.containsKey(String)
    Please use BSONObject.containsField(String) instead
    org.bson.BasicBSONObject.containsKey(String) 
    org.bson.LazyBSONObject.containsKey(String)
    org.bson.types.BasicBSONList.containsKey(String) 
    com.mongodb.DBCollection.find(DBObject, DBObject, int, int)
    Please use subsequent calls DBCollection.find(DBObject, DBObject), DBCursor.batchSize(int), DBCursor.skip(int) instead.
    com.mongodb.DBCollection.find(DBObject, DBObject, int, int, int)
    Please use subsequent calls DBCollection.find(DBObject, DBObject), DBCursor.batchSize(int), DBCursor.skip(int), DBCursor.setOptions(int) instead.
    com.mongodb.Mongo.getMongoOptions()
    Please use MongoClient class to connect to server and corresponging MongoClient.getMongoClientOptions()
    com.mongodb.MapReduceOutput.getRaw()
    org.bson.BSONCallback.gotBinaryArray(String, byte[])
    org.bson.BasicBSONCallback.gotBinaryArray(String, byte[])
    org.bson.EmptyBSONCallback.gotBinaryArray(String, byte[])
    com.mongodb.DBCollection.group(DBObject)
    com.mongodb.DB.slaveOk()
    com.mongodb.DBCollection.slaveOk()
    com.mongodb.DBCursor.slaveOk()
    Replaced with ReadPreference.secondaryPreferred()
    com.mongodb.Mongo.slaveOk()
    Replaced with ReadPreference.secondaryPreferred()
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.mongodb.Mongo()
    Replaced by MongoClient.MongoClient())
    com.mongodb.Mongo(List)
    Replaced by MongoClient.MongoClient(java.util.List)
    com.mongodb.Mongo(List, MongoOptions)
    Replaced by MongoClient.MongoClient(java.util.List, MongoClientOptions)
    com.mongodb.Mongo(MongoURI)
    Replaced by MongoClient.MongoClient(MongoClientURI)
    com.mongodb.Mongo(ServerAddress)
    Replaced by MongoClient.MongoClient(ServerAddress)
    com.mongodb.Mongo(ServerAddress, MongoOptions)
    Replaced by MongoClient.MongoClient(ServerAddress, MongoClientOptions)
    com.mongodb.Mongo(ServerAddress, ServerAddress)
    Please use MongoClient.MongoClient(java.util.List) instead.
    com.mongodb.Mongo(ServerAddress, ServerAddress, MongoOptions)
    Please use MongoClient.MongoClient(java.util.List, MongoClientOptions) instead.
    com.mongodb.Mongo(String)
    Replaced by MongoClient.MongoClient(String)
    com.mongodb.Mongo(String, int)
    Replaced by MongoClient.MongoClient(String, int)
    com.mongodb.Mongo(String, MongoOptions)
    Replaced by MongoClient.MongoClient(String, MongoClientOptions)
    com.mongodb.MongoURI(MongoClientURI)
    com.mongodb.MongoURI(String)
    Replaced by MongoClientURI.MongoClientURI(String)
